widgets.title: Devices
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) from RokuSystem since 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Crash Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED') * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: VSF Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0)  * 100  as '%' since 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: HTTP Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Content Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Initial Buffer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Measured Bitrate
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Devices
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) from RokuSystem since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto facet deviceModel

widgets.title: Crash Rate
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT (filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED')) as '%' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

widgets.title: Video Start Failure Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0) * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

widgets.title: HTTP Error Rate
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as 'HTTP Error Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as 'Interruption Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

widgets.title: Content Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as 'Content Error Ratio' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Initial Buffer Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Player Ready Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Content Measured Bitrate (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Crash Rate
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT (filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED')) as '%' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

widgets.title: Crashes by Device Model
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET deviceModel

widgets.title: Crashes by Reason
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET lastExitOrTerminationReason

widgets.title: Crashes by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET appVersion, appBuild

widgets.title: Crashes by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET appVersion, appBuild TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Video Start Failure Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0) * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

widgets.title: Error Messages
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet errorMessage since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: VSF by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: VSF by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: In-stream Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START')  * 100  as '%' since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: In-stream Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START') * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

widgets.title: In-stream Errors by Message
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet errorMessage since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: In-stream Errors by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: In-stream Errors by App Version, Build
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: HTTP Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'

widgets.title: HTTP Events by ActionName
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' facet actionName

widgets.title: HTTP by origUrl
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' facet origUrl

widgets.title: HTTP Error Rate
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as 'HTTP Error Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

widgets.title: Non-OK Results
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' and httpResult != 'OK' facet httpResult

widgets.title: Video | http.error on hls .ts segments
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM RokuSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND origUrl LIKE '%.ts%' FACET status SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: http.error (not video traffic)
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM RokuSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl NOT LIKE '%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.m3u8%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.ts%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.mpd%') FACET status SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Video | http.error on hls .mp4 segments
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM RokuSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl LIKE '%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%index_audio%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%index_video%.mp4%') FACET status SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Video | http.error on hls manifest
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM RokuSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl LIKE '%.m3u8%') FACET status SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: HTTP First Byte and Transfer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT percentile(firstByteTime, 50), percentile(transferTime, 50) timeseries auto

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as 'Interruption Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) as 'Buffer Starts' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet connectionType   since 30 seconds ago

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time by Connection Type
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet connectionType

widgets.title: Initial Buffer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Initial Buffer Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet connectionType

widgets.title: Views with the Most Rebuffer Events
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) Where actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead > 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Views with Longest Rebuffer Times
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Views with the Most Initial Buffer Events
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) Where actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead = 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Views with Longest Initial Buffer Times
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Player Load Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Player Ready Time (Mean)
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Player Load by Device Model
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel

widgets.title: Player Load by Device Model
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT histogram(timeSinceLoad, buckets: 10, width: 20) WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel

widgets.title: KPIs
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem, RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ( 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) as 'Crashes', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) as 'Video Start Failures', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') as 'HTTP Errors', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR') as 'Content Errors', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead > 0) as 'Interruptions', filter(percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0) as 'Rebuffer Time (s)',  filter(percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0) as 'Initial Buffer Time (s)', filter(percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50), WHERE actionName = 'PLAYER_READY') as 'Player Load Time (s)', filter(percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_HEARTBEAT') as 'Measured Bitrate'  since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: Uuids
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem, RokuVideo SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) timeseries auto

widgets.title: Crash Ratio by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED') * 100 facet uuid

widgets.title: VSF Ratio by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0)  * 100  as '%' facet uuid

widgets.title: HTTP Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'facet uuid

widgets.title: Content Error Ratio
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as '%'facet uuid

widgets.title: Interruption Ratio by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'facet uuid

widgets.title: Rebuffer Time by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet uuid

widgets.title: Initial Buffer Time by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet uuid

widgets.title: Player Load Time
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet uuid

widgets.title: Measured Bitrate by Uuid
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) facet uuid

widgets.title: Events
widgets.nrql: FROM RokuSystem, RokuVideo SELECT * limit 1000
